name: Lava Tongues
description: Flows of underwater lava create unique environments and potential sources of valuable minerals. The extreme heat creates unique research opportunities, while the molten rock creates constant danger of burns or structural collapse.
atmosphere: Steam explosions create underwater fireworks of heat and pressure with loud popping sounds. The warm water carries the scent of volcanic minerals and molten earth. Molten lava flows like fiery rivers beneath the ocean surface. Extreme heat creates unique research opportunities. Molten rock creates constant danger of burns. Your body feels the intense heat even through the cold ocean water.
